version_description:
It's time for a funny new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Let's make a balloon party! Use BALLOON PUMPS to blow up the balloons. Ready for the best part? You are going to pop them all!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we will bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a blasting new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Collect the cubes and launch the SPACE ROCKET! The adventure will begin the moment you sit on the pilot seat and you will see the stars darting around you. Help the Toons to blast off the Rockets and jump to space!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a blasting new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Collect the cubes and launch the SPACE ROCKET! The adventure will begin the moment you sit on the pilot seat and you will see the stars darting around you. Help the Toons to blast off the Rockets and jump to space!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a bubbly new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Time to have some foamy fun by playing with all the SOAP scattered around. Who does not enjoy popping those lovely floating bubbles! Meanwhile, you can give the Land of Toon a good cleaning too!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a wacky new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Time to play some Whack-A-Mole! A horde of moles jumping in and out all around the Toonland raising a huge ruckus. Grab a mallet and let's see if you can pop these silly critters before they can run back to their holes!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a wacky new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Time to play some Whack-A-Mole! A horde of moles jumping in and out all around the Toonland raising a huge ruckus. Grab a mallet and let's see if you can pop these silly critters before they can run back to their holes!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a freezing new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Lake is frozen, come out for a stroll. But watch where you step if you don't want to turn into an icicle! It seems poor little PENGUINS were not so careful. They fell into the water and trapped inside the ice cubes! Will you help The Toons to rescue them?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a chirpy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Come to carpenter's workshop and bring out your tools, we will build a cute little BIRDHOUSE! It will be a lot of fun to play with wood and our feathery friends will have a new home too. Such a great hobby to pass the weekend with!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a mischievous new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Double, double toil and trouble; Fire burn and cauldron bubble. Time for some sorcery and mischief-making with Toons. Stir the mixture until the magical color changing Potion is prepared!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a western new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! It's high noon and The Infamous Toon Brothers are in town! The gold in the bank is not safe while these silly bandits are around, especially if they get their hands on some powder keg!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring new episodes and levels. Come and join the fun!

It's time for a rocky new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! We are reaching the 1000th Level! So it's time to explore the cavernous depths! We will descend to the mines under the mountain, so don your helmet and grab some dynamite. Blast the rocks to clear the way for a journey deep into the earth and reveal the mysteries hidden beneath!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring new episodes and levels. Come and join the fun!

It's time for a spelunking new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! The Team of Minesweepers is exploring the local caverns for the forgotten landmines hidden within rocks. Be careful and watch where you step! There are all kinds of dangers lurking in these wild cave systems.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a spelunking new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! The Team of Minesweepers is exploring the local caverns for the forgotten landmines hidden within rocks. Be careful and watch where you step! There are all kinds of dangers lurking in these wild cave systems.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a fleeing new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Raise the alarm! 3 silly prisoners are attempting a getaway from the infamous island prison. They got over barbed wires, ran from searchlights and now they are crossing the dark waters with a makeshift raft. See if these funny escapees can make it to their freedom!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a mind-bending new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Are you ready to take the ultimate mind challenge with the Tower of Hanoi? Our very underqualified lab assistants will test your intelligence with silly contraptions, as you go through this mind-twisting puzzle. We are confident that you can beat Bruno Bear, who got the lowest score possible.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for an inexplicable new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Mysterious circles on the crop fields, strange lights flashing in the night skies... Things will get bizarre at the rural farms as UFOs visit secluded places of the countryside! Play the new levels and see if farmers can save themselves from this enigmatic abductors from the outer space?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a festive new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Put on the elegant masks and traditional costumes, we will attend to The Carnival of Venice! Hop on a Gondola, and get ready for romantic moments, while boatman rows you through the lovely Venetian Canals.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a mind-bending new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Are you ready to take the ultimate mind challenge with the Tower of Hanoi? Our very underqualified lab assistants will test your intelligence with silly contraptions, as you go through this mind-twisting puzzle. We are confident that you can beat Bruno Bear, who got the lowest score possible.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a chivalrous new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Come one! Come all! By the mandate of our good king, a tourney shall be held by The Castle Toonburgh! All the gallant knights of the realm who is bold enough to brave the lists shall don their armor, ready their lances and prepare for jousting on this glorious day!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for an express new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Knock knock! You got a package! The Toon Express delivery service is proud to deliver your goods to your door! And we confidently deny any responsibility for the damages that might be occurred during the delivery due to shaking, stomping, punching and blasting!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a sandy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Miles and miles of desert! After days of walking on scorching sands, Toons are totally lost and they almost ran out of water! Will they be able to find a source to replenish their supplies on these vast and blazing dunes of the Sahara?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring new episodes and levels. Come and join the fun!

It's time for a tropical new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! If you visit the paradise beaches of the Coco Island, be sure to stop by the Toon Bar. While you enjoy the beautiful nature, they will prepare your fresh coconut juice, if they can manage to crack it of course! Maybe give them a hand if you have any rockets or anvils.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for an orbital new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Houston, we have a problem! The spacewalk mission went terribly wrong due to the extreme silliness of the astronauts. We need help to get the Toons back from the orbit before they get suffocated!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a burgeoning new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! This is what happens when you give fertilizer to magical beans. Now all the town is tangled in the climbing ivy, thriving fast to become a forest. The enormous stems will not build a staircase to the clouds, instead, they will strangle you until your eyes pop. You have to get rid of them quickly!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a slick new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Is that stubble I see on your cheek, sir? How about a visit to the newly opened Toon Barber at the corner? You will feel rejuvenated once Wally gives you a clean shave. He's a master with the razor, almost. Well, at least we promise you'll leave with less hair.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a soldierly new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Ten-hut! Welcome to boot camp, trooper. You are now officially a part of the Toon Army! Through rigorous training, we will make you an excellent player who will keep blasting under all circumstances. Your first task is to handle these extremely dangerous missiles. Forward, MARCH!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a spiritual new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Drums thunder on the vast plains and under the shining stars. Step into the circle around the fire to join the Stomp Dance! We will call the spirits of the toons and consult their wisdom of blasting. By this mystical ceremony, you will be one with nature and awaken the Toon Blaster in you!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a spiritual new update!
- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Drums thunder on the vast plains and under the shining stars. Step into the circle around the fire to join the Stomp Dance! We will call the spirits of the toons and consult their wisdom of blasting. By this mystical ceremony, you will be one with nature and awaken the Toon Blaster in you!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for an oriental new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Come closer traveler, have a look at our exotic wares. You walk among the stalls of the Grand Bazaar. From foreign spices to elaborate pottery, there are myriads of items here from the far and mysterious corners of the world! Now wouldn't you be interested in these colorful vases? Who knows, there may be forgotten treasures left inside!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a pastoral new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Toons inherited grandfather's old farm plot! With the old tractor and a few rusty tools, they set out to begin their new rural life. Since they have no skills at all, it will be hard for them to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into fertile land.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a deep and dark new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Toons are learning the hard way about the cost of crossing the Dark Baron! They have been imprisoned in the labyrinthine dungeons beneath the Baron's castle. Tightly wrapped up in chains and without any way to escape, they are haplessly waiting for their mysterious fate!
Can you bail them out?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a marooned new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Stranded in the middle of the ocean on a makeshift raft surrounded by hungry sharks, with only one day's freshwater remaining, Toons surely seem like in a tight spot this time! But as always, their moods are cheery and hopeful in full belief that as adventure goes on, they will evade this difficulty too.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a freshly cleaned new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! We are proud to announce that Toon Laundry Service offers the best cleaning for your laundry in Toonville. The washers we use are old but reliable, nevermind the occasional breakdowns and explosions. If any of them start making moves and sounds that they aren't supposed to do, call our expert repair crew with years of experience on putting down old washers.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a splashy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Now that the public pool is open to all visitors, we would kindly like to remind you of some of the rules: Running, pushing, splashing and all kinds of horseplay are forbidden unless you are a Toon. Also, please be informed that jumping from ridiculous heights is encouraged at all times to prevent any unlikely event of boredom. Swim safely.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a dynamic new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Neither dusty courts nor noisy roads are an excuse for procrastination. Get ready for freestyle dunks, merciless blocks and nothing but nets. Pick up your sports gear and join our buzzer-beaters to watch some acrobatic moves.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a power surging new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Warning! All systems are critical! Toon activity at unsafe levels detected. Emergency protocols are now active. Proceed to the immediate evacuation of the Blast Power facility!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It’s time for a frosty new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Behind every good goalie is an empty net. Obviously, it’d be best if the other teammates can at least stand on ice. Grab a seat in the Toon Arena and show your support to the squad in this challenge!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a new update full of adrenaline!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Parachutes are ready, all equipment is checked, the wind is favorable, altitude is enough... It's time to jump rookies! Remember to hold hands with your buddy and yell "TOON!"

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a wavy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Toons rule the waves! It is summer, time to grab the board and run to the seaside. Come check the coolest trio surfing by the beach! And this time they almost look like they know what they are doing...  

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a felonious new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! "Sir, the security footage from last night shows that our robbers are none other than infamous Cooper, Wally, and Bruno! Yes, sir, they left all the gold in the bin again. And the Safe has been dropped from the top of the building. We suspect they did this just for fun, like they always do!"

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a breathtaking new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Could you prevent ruckus and disorder if you put the three masters of disorder in uniforms? You're about to find out, because The Toon Patrol is on duty! Streets are mean, but toon cops are meaner!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a primeval new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Archaeologists theorize that the first scrambled eggs, which were made by the first prehistoric Toons, were tremendous work. It required lots of trial and error, hiding from giant reptiles, and running for one's own life.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a flourishing new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! As nature awakens once more and fields are getting covered with beautiful blossoms, Toons are getting into the spring spirit with the fabulously fun egg-and-spoon racing game. Why not come and participate?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a clamorous new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Make some popcorn and turn on the TV! The big derby is tonight! Such fanatics they are, Cooper, Wally, and Bruno never miss a match of Toonville United. Join them for lots of fun in this exciting game night!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a scrumptious new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! The fresh, delicious, steaming pizza goodness, prepared by no other than Toons themselves, is right at the corner and you definitely should give it a try! Do not dwell too much on the charred parts though, Bruno is getting better with the oven every day...

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a breathtaking new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! The brave adventurers are after the secret of the fabled potion of immortality, said to be hidden in the depths of the forgotten temple ruins. All they have to do is go and fetch it. Of course, everything will be just fine...

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a puzzling new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! What is the mystery behind the vanishing of Toons happening in the foggy night of London? The consulting detective and genius Cooper, along with his sidekicks veteran Wally and officer Bruno are, on the case. Will they be able to unravel it?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a flashy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Ladies and gentlemen, the Blast Theater, world's finest home of family entertainment, is proud to announce for the first time, not only one toon or two, but three! Presenting you; Cooper, Wally, and Bruno in their amazing musical act!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a healthy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Even Toons need to get fit. 15 minutes on the treadmill, 15 minutes bench press, 15 minutes cube blasting... Poor Bruno will surely break a sweat! You can skip leg day, but you can't skip this amazing new episode!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a botanical new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Time for some gardening, trim the hedges and mow the lawn! Toons are having a fun time in the garden. While they are at it, why not plant the strange seed that they found behind the shelves of the old shack? What could go wrong?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a combustive new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! If you think this year's chemistry class will be boring, think again, because your instructors will be no other than professors Cooper, Wally and Bruno. They hold the highest degree on explosive reactions and they believe in the applied science method! So get ready for a blast of a lesson!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a mystical new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Hop on the magical carpet that the Toons bought from a mysterious merchant and fly above the burning sands. You'll feel like you are living a tale of Scheherazade as you venture through the mystical Arabian nights. An enchanting adventure awaits you!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a striking new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Dear Visitors, if you see a cat, a wolf, and a bear running rampant around the holes during your visit to our golf course, please remain calm and do give these poor things a hand. They can't hit the broad side of a barn, I don't even know why we let them in in the first place.

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a heartwarming new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! In this jolly night, when Toons gather around the fireplace and exchange gifts, join us for a cup of hot chocolate and some cookies. Help Toons open their gifts, just hope that it is not another bomb or anvil!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a woody new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! TIIIIIIMMBEEEEEERRR!!! It's work time in the woodlands. Toons, all in their lumberjack outfits, are eager to get their hands dirty. But they will be needing some heavy-duty machinery to chop down these mighty old woods. Beware of the falling trunks!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a fearless new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Is smoke rising from the oven? Don't worry, the daring firefighters of your neighborhood are on their way to rescue your kitchen! They may be a bit clumsy, but you can't find a braver soul around when it comes to saving dishes!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a healthy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Even Toons need to get fit. 15 minutes on the treadmill, 15 minutes bench press, 15 minutes cube blasting... Poor Bruno will surely break a sweat! You can skip leg day, but you can't skip this amazing new episode!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a snowy new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! What would Toons do on their winter holiday? Why, grab their skiing stuff and hit the mountainside of course! It may be a bit too exciting for some, but they surely have a blast of a time!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

It's time for a botanical new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Time for some gardening, trim the hedges and mow the lawn! Toons are having a fun time in the garden. While they are at it, why not plant the strange seed that they found behind the shelves of the old shack? What could go wrong?

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!

Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!
